type.description:
## Exposed to Sun

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/exposed_to_sun)

Checks whether the entity is currently exposed to the sun, which is essentially a mix of [Brightness (Entity Condition Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/exposed_to_sun) that checks if the brightness level at the entity's eyes is greather than 0.5 and [Exposed to Sky (Entity Condition Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/exposed_to_sun).

Type ID: `origins:exposed_to_sun`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:exposed_to_sun"
}
```
